name: SUPERBUG (Triangle, BlueBaldwin, exophagious)
description:
Playing as 2020's infamous Superbug, you must fight against your host's immune system and make your way through her bloodstream. On your way you will encounter medical interference, which you must execute with your toxic spines, eliminating everything in your path. 

To win the game you must fully infect your host!

CREATED BY Joe Darcy (Triangle), Rosie Campbell (exophagious) and Scott Baldwin.

Coding and music: Joe Darcy

Artwork and animation: Rosie Campbell

Design and coding: Scott Baldwin

CONTROLS

WASD = movement control 

SPACEBAR = shoot

ESC = exit

*KNOWN BUGS*

*Sometimes you have to die at least once in the first level in order to progress to the rest of the game. So... kill yourself? lol*
